content.name: UT CaC Option - No Angular Limitation
content.description: Removes the Angular Pitch and Roll Limits from all Ships making them more maneuverable
content.author: UniTrader

text.name: UT CaC Option - No Angular Limitation
text.description: Removes the Angular Pitch and Roll Limits from all Ships making them more maneuverable

text.name: UT CaC Option - Keine Winkelbegrenzung
text.description: Entfent die Roll- und Pitch-begrenzung von allen Schiffen, damit diese besser manövrieren können
text.author: UniTrader
